name: Satellite Defense
description:
This was made for my eight game jam participation and the Score Space  game jam. The only restrictions for this game jam was making a game around the theme Protect and including a highscore. The game was made in Unity.

The team:

MathewHD - Programming

Way Gone - Programming

Admiral Foreskin - 3D Modelling

Gendo Glow - Music & SFX
